pages.text: Iesnium is an $(thing)Otherworld Ore$() spawning in the Nether. As such it can only be mined with an $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_infused_pickaxe)Infused Pickaxe$(/l) or $(item)Iesnium Pickaxe$() while wearing $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_otherworld_goggles)Otherworld Goggles$(/l).
The first application of Iesnium is making a tool to mine more Iesnium!
The main use of Iesnum is using it to summon $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_miner_spirits)Miner Spirits$(/l) for the $(l:rituals/crafting/craft_dimensional_mineshaft)Dimensional Mineshaft$(/l).
